title: Mortgage Zone
content: Full-Stack Mortgage Application - A mortgage resource center. I build using React js, React Bootstrap for the front-end and node.js, express and MongoDB for the back-end. Deployed on GCP

title: Much Todo App
content: Front-End To Do application - created a full stack app with Full CRUD, Login and Signup functionality. Tech Stack: React, Javascript

title: Quiz App
content: Built a simple quiz app in react js. Created a json file with data for questions and answers.

title: TV Show App
content: TV show application using React and React Bootstrap that lets you add your favorite TV shows

title: Sydney Clock
content: This app tells you the time in Sydney Austrailia.  It was created using basic HTML, CSS and vanilla Javascript

title: Top Drivers
content: This app displays the top 3 Golf Drivers and describes each as well as shows a video regarding the drivers.  This website was created using basic HTML & CSS
